instructions:
In a skillet with a small amount of bacon drippings break up and begin to brown ground beef. Add
peppers and onions and continue browning beef. Remove excess grease, stir in remaining ingredients and
simmer for 7 or 8 minutes. Makes enough for 3 hamburger rolls. 
*(Rev. 2/22/97)*
name: Sloppy Joe Sandwich Filling
creator: Mary Decker
